name: gemini-cli-assistant
description: Gemini CLI integration for large context analysis, enabling Claude Code to leverage Gemini's million-token context window for codebase-wide analysis
author: Your Name

agents.name: Gemini Code Analyzer
agents.description: Uses Gemini CLI to analyze large codebases or files that exceed Claude Code's context window. Supports single file analysis, entire project overview, feature verification, and multi-file analysis.
